Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: DNA SBs damage was negatively associated with TAP ( R = - 0 . 98 , p = 0 . 018 ) , and necrosis ( R = - 0 . 97 , p = 0 . 027 ) .

| --- |

| necrosis |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| DNA SBs damage |
| TAP (Thrombotic microangiopathy) |
| necrosis |

Explanation:

* DNA SBs damage: This refers to damage to DNA Small Bodies, which is a specific type of cellular damage.
* TAP: Thrombotic microangiopathy is a disease characterized by thrombosis and damage to small blood vessels.
* necrosis: This refers to the death of living tissue in an organ or part of an organ. It is a type of disease or condition.
